questions.question: I am traveling with my family, they stole all our bags from our rented car, will the insurance reimburse the value of what stolen?
questions.outcome_justification: The Baggage must have been duly checked in by the Insured and delivered to the Check-in Desk of the air carrier for boarding in the hold. The Insured's Hand Baggage and all baggage not delivered to the Carrier at the time of Check-in are also excluded.

questions.question: I got a precious handbag stolen while in a bar in  Paris, with mobile phone and documents in it, can you help me with the costs I'll have to bear?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy only covers non-delivery of baggage by the air carrier at the airport of arrival resulting from the ticket. The stolen handbag in a Paris bar does not meet the definition of 'Baggage' (must be delivered to the carrier at check-in) and is excluded under ARTICLE 1.4: 'The Insured's Hand Baggage and all baggage not delivered to the Carrier at the time of Check-in are also excluded.'

questions.question: I had dinner at our the resort yesterday, and I had an awful night with pain in the stomach and diharreha, I want to see a doctor, can you send one to our hotel?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy only covers baggage-related indemnities (Indennizzo per Mancata consegna del Bagaglio) and does not include provisions for medical assistance, healthcare services, or doctor visits.

questions.question: My daughter had an accident by bike and needs to see a doctor. We are in Amsterdam, shall we advance the payment of the hospital?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy context provided exclusively addresses baggage non-delivery coverage (SECTION C – INSURANCE GUARANTEE CHAPTER 1). There is no mention of medical expense coverage, accident benefits, or healthcare reimbursement provisions in the quoted policy sections.

questions.question: My daughter had an accident by bike and needs to see a doctor. We are in Tokyo, is the insurance going to anticipate the costs?
I am traveling alone, my business partner had a hearth attack and I have to go back home. Will you reimbuse the rest of the trip?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy documentation does not contain any coverage provisions for trip reimbursement due to a business partner's medical emergency. Articles 9-15 primarily address contractor obligations, documentation requirements, premium payment defaults, and policy limitations, but do not establish coverage for this scenario.

questions.question: I am traveling with my family, my business partner had a hearth attack and we have to go back home. Will you reimbuse the rest of the trip?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy focuses on baggage indemnity and does not include coverage for trip interruption due to medical emergencies affecting third parties (e.g., business partners). No provision in the quoted policy sections supports reimbursement for this scenario.

questions.question: My business partner had a hearth attack and I can't leave any more. Will you reimburse the cost of the trip?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy specifically covers baggage checked into the hold of a flight (Section C - Chapter 1 Art. 1.2), not trip cancellations due to health events. Coverage must be acquired before departure (Art. 3) and is limited to baggage-related claims.

questions.question: I had to be in Mayorca for 15 days, but after 5 days my mother in law had a health issue and I have to go back home, will you reimburse the rest of my holidays?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy does not include coverage for trip interruptions or reimbursements due to personal/family health issues. Article 2 explicitly states: 'If the Insured Person does not benefit from one or more of the purchased services, the Company is not required to provide compensation or alternative services as compensation.'

questions.question: My mother in law had a health issue and I can't leave any more. Will you reimburse my trip?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy does not contain provisions covering trip reimbursement due to family health issues. Coverage explicitly limited to 'Indennizzo per Mancata consegna del Bagaglio' (Baggage Delivery Failure Indemnity) and general contractor obligations regarding premiums/data reporting.

questions.question: (Cruise) My son twisted and akle at the swimmingpool, and won't be able to walk out of the cabin for 2 days, have we got the right to a reimbursemet?
questions.outcome_justification: The guarantee described in SECTION C – INSURANCE GUARANTEE Chapter 1 applies exclusively to 'COMPENSATION FOR NON-DELIVERY OF BAGGAGE' and does not cover medical incidents or injuries sustained during leisure activities.

questions.question: My aunt died yesterday, we shall leave on holidays tomorrow, but obviously we need to attend the funeral and deal with family issues, will the insurance reimburse us?
questions.outcome_justification: No policy context provided to determine if the event is covered under the policy terms.

questions.question: Our flight was late in Dubai and we have missed the coincidence for Tokyo, the next flight will be in 10 hours. Will you reimburse us the lounge or a day hotel?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy only covers compensation for non-delivery of checked baggage (SECTION C – INSURANCE GUARANTEE CHAPTER 1). Flight delays and missed connections are not covered events under the provided policy terms.

questions.question: We had to leave for Toronto with American Airlines today, but our flight was cancelled. We will need to take the next fight depending on availability. Will you pay for an upgrade in case only more expensive tickets are available?
questions.outcome_justification: Claim question and policy context not provided in the prompt. Analysis requires specific details about the event/loss and policy terms to determine coverage applicability.

questions.question: My flight landed 3 hours late in Sao Paulo, will you reimburse us?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy only covers compensation for non-delivery of checked baggage (ARTICLE 1.1), not flight delays. There is no mention of flight delay compensation coverage in the provided policy context.

questions.question: I have an existing patology that got incredibly worst during the last days, I am afraid I won't be able to leave. Will the insurance reimburse my trip?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy does not contain provisions explicitly covering reimbursement for trip cancellation due to worsening of pre-existing pathologies. Coverage for medical emergencies typically requires unforeseen acute events occurring during the trip, not pre-existing conditions.

questions.question: (Cruise) I have an issue at work and need to stop my 2 weeks cruise in advance. Will I be reimbursed of the remaining days?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy only covers baggage non-delivery claims (SECTION C - CHAPTER 1 Art. 1.1) and does not provide coverage for trip interruptions or early termination of vacations due to work-related issues.

questions.question: We are in Mexico, and we had an alarm at our place, maybe there was a robbery. Will you reimburse the damage?

I am traveing in India with my wife and two kids. My wife's uncle died yesteday, and we must wrap-up and go back (he was very close to us), will the company reimburse us for the expenses of changin tickets, so that we can be present to his burial?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy only covers compensation for non-delivery of baggage (SECTION C – INSURANCE GUARANTEE CHAPTER 1). There is no coverage provision for trip cancellation or ticket change expenses due to family bereavement.

questions.question: We are traveling in India, a massive flood has blocked us here, and we are supposed to take our flight back home tomorrow. Realistically, we won't be able to move before a couple of days. Will the insurance assume the additional costs?
questions.outcome_justification: No policy context or claim question provided to assess coverage eligibility.

questions.question: (Cruise) My hausbad had a stroke during the cruise, we are now in Athens, in the hospital, but the ship has gone. Will you reimburse us and pay for the hospital and for the flights back to Rome?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy exclusively covers baggage non-delivery and flight delay compensation, with no provisions for medical emergencies, hospitalization, or repatriation due to health events like strokes.

questions.question: (Cruise) We are traveling in the Caraibe, but our neighbour called that there's a water leak in our appartment. We can't do much, but as we will be back in 5 days, it might be too late. Can you send someone?
questions.outcome_justification: SECTION B – INSURANCE CONDITIONS specifies coverage applies only to 'Insured Baggage' during the flight route specified in the policy certificate (Art. 3). The claim involves a water leak in an apartment unrelated to baggage delivery issues.

questions.question: (Cruise) We are supposed to leave in two days, but my son broke his wrist playing basketball. We wish to move our reservation of one month, will you help us with the additional costs?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy only covers compensation for baggage non-delivery by air carriers (ARTICLE 1.1) and does not include coverage for trip rescheduling due to personal injuries or family emergencies.

questions.question: I am at the airport in New York with my family and my bag was shipped to Dubai. Do I have the right to a refund from the insurance?
We are a group of 20, we have just landed in Sao Paulo, but one of our team didn't recieve the bag at the airport. Does he has the right to a reimbursement?
We are a group of 20, we have just landed in Sao Paulo, but 4 of our team (two couples of coleauges) have to leave back due to urgent matters at work. Will the company reimburse their trip?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy context provided does not include coverage provisions for trip reimbursement due to urgent work matters. The only explicitly mentioned guarantee is 'Indennizzo per Mancata consegna del Bagaglio' (Baggage Delivery Indemnity), which does not apply to this scenario.

questions.question: I am traveling to Japan and had a stop in Dubai with my family of 4. Our flight arrived in Dubai 4 hours later. Although we didn't miss the conicidence with our flight to Tokyo, will the insurance contribute for the discomfort?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy specifically covers 'risk of non-delivery of the Insured's luggage' (Section A - Definitions) and does not provide coverage for flight delays or passenger discomfort unrelated to baggage irregularities. The described event (flight delay without missed connection or baggage issues) falls outside the defined scope of coverage.
